MK_CMDName.label: Command name
MK_CMDName.tooltip: The command for skipping the currently playing song

MK_CMDIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
MK_CMDIsGlobal.tooltip: Shows if this command has a global cooldown

MK_CMDDescription.value: Plays the next song in the playlist
MK_CMDDescription.label: Description

MK_Cost.label: Cost
MK_Cost.tooltip: The currency cost for triggering this command

MK_FreeForMods.label: Free for mods
MK_FreeForMods.tooltip: Is this command free for mods?

MK_NotEnoughCurrency.label: Response (not enough currency)
MK_NotEnoughCurrency.tooltip: The response coming in chat, if the user does not have enough currency (use $user, $cost and $currencyname)

MK_Paid.label: Response (success)
MK_Paid.tooltip: The response coming in chat, if the user successfully skips the song (use $user, $cost and $currencyname)

MK_ModSkips.value: $user does not pay $cost $currencyname due to the mod status!
MK_ModSkips.label: Response (mod skips)
MK_ModSkips.tooltip: The response coming in chat, if the user skips the song and is a mod (use $user, $cost and $currencyname)
